Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Joe Biden said he grew up in Section 8 housing, when in fact he said he lived in a building that later became Section 8 housing.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Section 8 housing did not exist when Biden was a child.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it misquotes what Biden actually said at the town hall meeting.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that Biden grew up in Section 8 housing based on a misinterpretation of his statements.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that Biden lived in a building that later became Section 8 housing, rather than growing up in Section 8 housing.
